name: How to raise a Demon
description:
In How to raise a Demon you play as an alchemist, who wants to create a vicious monster by performing dark magic rituals. Once created, the creature can however not survive on its own…

A game made by a team of four people in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46.

Controls WASD - move
LMB - attack
RMB - Dash
F - Interact/Pick up
G - Drop
Q - Heal
Installation Instructions Download the file below, unzip and run 'LDJam46KeepItAlive.exe'.

Have Fun!
